roleset.name: fill again
roleset.note: REFILL-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from refill.01-v)

example.name: passive, arg1
example.text: As the camp emptied , it-1 was refilled [*-1] by a draining of the camps andtowns around Lublin , then by deportees from outside Poland .
example.arg: by a draining of the camps and towns around Lublin , then by deportees from outside Poland

roleset.name: fulfill or satisfy again
roleset.note: REFILL-V NOTES: Based on frame for fill.06 and Clinical Notes corpus. Framed by Anwen Feb 2011. (from refill.02-v)

example.name: All Args
example.text: The pharmacist refilled Billie's coumadin prescription at a discounted price.
